description: An overgrown garden hidden behind a large stone wall, full of vibrant, rare plants and flowers.
revealPassageHint: Look closely at the ivy on the north wall; it seems to be hiding something.
specialFeatureDescription: A magical fountain that restores health when drank from.

items.name: Mystic Herb
items.description: A rare herb with healing properties.

items.name: Ancient Key
items.description: A rusted key, perhaps it opens a nearby gate.

description: An old workshop filled with strange tools and half-finished contraptions. Dust covers every surface.
specialFeatureDescription: A workbench that can be used to craft unique items.
puzzleHint: There is a strange device on the wall with four rotating dials; perhaps aligning them correctly will reveal something.

items.name: Old Hammer
items.description: A well-used hammer, slightly worn but still functional.

items.name: Gear Assembly
items.description: An intricate set of gears, part of a larger machine.

description: A dark, circular room where whispers echo from every corner. The air feels thick with secrets.
revealPassageHint: Listen closely to the whispers; one voice seems to guide you toward the eastern wall.
puzzleHint: A series of symbols on the floor must be pressed in a specific order to unlock the exit.

items.name: Whispering Stone
items.description: A small stone that hums softly when held.

description: Glittering suits of armor line the walls, their polished surfaces reflecting your every move.
specialFeatureDescription: An enchanted forge that can imbue weapons with magical properties.
puzzleHint: A riddle inscribed on a plaque above the forge must be solved to activate it: 'I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind.'

items.name: Enchanted Sword
items.description: A finely crafted sword with a faint, magical glow.

items.name: Mystic Shield
items.description: A shield that feels warm to the touch, offering strong protection.
